Key Match Events: Luka Doncic helped lead the team to a 110-93 victory.
Luka Doncic finished with 16 points, six rebounds, six assists and two steals while shooting 6/16 from the field and 3/9 from the three-point range in 28 minutes of playing time.
Post-Match Reflections: Luka Doncic was honest when asked about not being 100% healthy.
Doncic stated, 'There's not a lot of time to rest, but I'll get better for sure. I promise.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: With the victory, the Mavs snapped a four-game losing streak.
The Mavs are now 6-7 in their first 13 games, which has them as tenth seed in the Western Conference.
